intro: Eriospermum arenosum, commonly known as the sand eriosperm, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa. It is characterized by its small, woolly leaves and yellow flowers that bloom in spring. The plant thrives in sandy soils and is adapted to withstand drought conditions. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers. Eriospermum arenosum is often found in open habitats such as grasslands and rocky outcrops.
